an5.180:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṃ carati mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ.
an5.180:1.2: Addasā kho bhagavā addhānamaggappaṭipanno aññatarasmiṃ padese mahantaṃ sālavanaṃ;
an5.180:1.3: disvāna maggā okkamma yena taṃ sālavanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ sālavanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
an5.180:2.2: “ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya?
an5.180:2.4: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an5.180:2.5: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya?
an5.180:3.1: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, ānanda, imasmiṃ padese nagaraṃ ahosi iddhañceva phītañca bahujanaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ.
an5.180:3.2: Taṃ kho panānanda, nagaraṃ kassapo bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho upanissāya vihāsi.
an5.180:3.3: Kassapassa kho panānanda, bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa gavesī nāma upāsako ahosi sīlesu aparipūrakārī.
an5.180:3.4: Gavesinā kho, ānanda, upāsakena pañcamattāni upāsakasatāni paṭidesitāni samādapitāni ahesuṃ sīlesu aparipūrakārino.
an5.180:3.5: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa upāsakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:3.6: ‘ahaṃ kho imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā, ahañcamhi sīlesu aparipūrakārī, imāni ca pañca upāsakasatāni sīlesu aparipūrakārino.
an5.180:4.1: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesī upāsako yena tāni pañca upāsakasatāni tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā tāni pañca upāsakasatāni etadavoca:
an5.180:4.3: Atha kho, ānanda, tesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ etadahosi:
an5.180:4.4: ‘ayyo kho gavesī amhākaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:4.5: Ayyo hi nāma gavesī sīlesu paripūrakārī bhavissati.
an5.180:4.7: Atha kho, ānanda, tāni pañca upāsakasatāni yena gavesī upāsako tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā gavesiṃ upāsakaṃ etadavocuṃ:
an5.180:4.8: ‘ajjatagge ayyo gavesī imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni sīlesu paripūrakārino dhāretū’ti.
an5.180:4.9: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa upāsakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:4.10: ‘ahaṃ kho imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā, ahañcamhi sīlesu paripūrakārī, imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni sīlesu paripūrakārino.
an5.180:5.1: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesī upāsako yena tāni pañca upāsakasatāni tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā tāni pañca upāsakasatāni etadavoca:
an5.180:5.2: ‘ajjatagge maṃ āyasmanto brahmacāriṃ dhāretha ārācāriṃ virataṃ methunā gāmadhammā’ti.
an5.180:5.3: Atha kho, ānanda, tesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ etadahosi:
an5.180:5.4: ‘ayyo kho gavesī amhākaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:5.5: Ayyo hi nāma gavesī brahmacārī bhavissati ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:5.7: Atha kho, ānanda, tāni pañca upāsakasatāni yena gavesī upāsako tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā gavesiṃ upāsakaṃ etadavocuṃ:
an5.180:5.8: ‘ajjatagge ayyo gavesī imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni brahmacārino dhāretu ārācārino viratā methunā gāmadhammā’ti.
an5.180:5.9: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa upāsakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:5.10: ‘ahaṃ kho imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:5.13: Ahañcamhi brahmacārī ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:5.14: Imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni brahmacārino ārācārino viratā methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:6.1: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesī upāsako yena tāni pañca upāsakasatāni tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā tāni pañca upāsakasatāni etadavoca:
an5.180:6.2: ‘ajjatagge maṃ āyasmanto ekabhattikaṃ dhāretha rattūparataṃ virataṃ vikālabhojanā’ti.
an5.180:6.3: Atha kho, ānanda, tesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ etadahosi:
an5.180:6.5: Ayyo hi nāma gavesī ekabhattiko bhavissati rattūparato virato vikālabhojanā.
an5.180:6.7: Atha kho, ānanda, tāni pañca upāsakasatāni yena gavesī upāsako tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā gavesiṃ upāsakaṃ etadavocuṃ:
an5.180:6.8: ‘ajjatagge ayyo gavesī imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni ekabhattike dhāretu rattūparate virate vikālabhojanā’ti.
an5.180:6.9: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa upāsakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:6.10: ‘ahaṃ kho imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:6.13: Ahañcamhi brahmacārī ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:6.14: Imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni brahmacārino ārācārino viratā methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:6.16: Imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni ekabhattikā rattūparatā viratā vikālabhojanā.
an5.180:7.1: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesī upāsako yena kassapo bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā kassapaṃ bhagavantaṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ etadavoca:
an5.180:7.2: ‘labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ labheyyaṃ upasampadan’ti.
an5.180:7.3: Alattha kho, ānanda, gavesī upāsako kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ.
an5.180:7.4: Acirūpasampanno kho panānanda, gavesī bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
an5.180:7.5: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti abbhaññāsi.
an5.180:7.6: Aññataro ca panānanda, gavesī bhikkhu arahataṃ ahosi.
an5.180:8.1: Atha kho, ānanda, tesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ etadahosi:
an5.180:8.2: ‘ayyo kho gavesī amhākaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:8.3: Ayyo hi nāma gavesī kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajissati.
an5.180:8.5: Atha kho, ānanda, tāni pañca upāsakasatāni yena kassapo bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā kassapaṃ bhagavantaṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ etadavocuṃ:
an5.180:8.6: ‘labheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampadan’ti.
an5.180:8.7: Alabhiṃsu kho, ānanda, tāni pañca upāsakasatāni kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa santike pabbajjaṃ, alabhiṃsu upasampadaṃ.
an5.180:9.1: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa bhikkhuno etadahosi:
an5.180:9.2: ‘ahaṃ kho imassa anuttarassa vimuttisukhassa nikāmalābhī homi akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an5.180:9.3: Aho vatimānipi pañca bhikkhusatāni imassa anuttarassa vimuttisukhassa nikāmalābhino assu akicchalābhino akasiralābhino’ti.
an5.180:9.4: Atha kho, ānanda, tāni pañca bhikkhusatāni vūpakaṭṭhā appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharantā nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
an5.180:9.5: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihariṃsu.
an5.180:9.6: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti abbhaññiṃsu.
an5.180:10.1: Iti kho, ānanda, tāni pañca bhikkhusatāni gavesīpamukhāni uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītaṃ vāyamamānā anuttaraṃ vimuttiṃ sacchākaṃsu.
